thread.title: Charlotte Crosby 'makes Stephen Bear get tattoo of her FACE and pokes fun at his exit from Celebs Go Dating'
thread.title_full: Charlotte Crosby 'makes Stephen Bear get tattoo of her FACE and pokes fun at his exit from Celebs Go Dating'

author: Lara Martin
title: Charlotte Crosby 'makes Stephen Bear get tattoo of her FACE and pokes fun at his exit from Celebs Go Dating'
text:
Celebs Charlotte Crosby 'makes Stephen Bear get tattoo of her FACE and pokes fun at his exit from Celebs Go Dating' The pair are signed up for new MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us, which challenges people to design tattoos for each other Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Charlotte and Bear out having fun Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Stephen Bear has everyone talking after revealing a brand new tattoo on his arm that fans reckon could be rumoured girlfriend Charlotte Crosby ’s face. 
They reality stars have signed up for new MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us, which sees them creating designs for each other which are then inked onto their bodies without either of them knowing beforehand what the tattoo will be. 
While the show hasn’t started yet, eagle eyed fans think they’ve sussed what tattoo Charlotte chose for Bear - an image of her very own face! Bear flashes his tattoo while next to Charlotte (Photo: MTV/Just Tattoo Of Us) Is that a face on Bear's arm? (Photo: MTV/Just Tattoo Of Us) Read More 
In a trailer for the MTV show, Bear is seen raising his left arm at one stage, flashing a face tattoo just under his bicep. 
An image of Charlotte or something else? 
According to The Sun , former Geordie Shore star Charlotte also had the words ‘You’re fired’ inked on Bear’s arm, in a reference to him being booted from E4 show Celebs Go Dating. 
“Charlotte couldn’t resist tattooing ‘you’re fired’ across Stephen’s arm. It’s a dig at him being suspended from Celebs Go Dating after lying about their relationship. Now he’ll never forget!” said the insider. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Charlotte Crosby FARTS in Stephen Bear's face! Share this video The show starts this month on MTV (Photo: MTV/Just Tattoo Of Us) Read More 
It’s been claimed Bear chose a rather outrageous tattoo for Charlotte in return and she was NOT happy. 
A show insider told Heat: "Bear decided to tattoo a half-cheetah, half-bear face on Charlotte's lower back. 
"When she found out she was not happy." 
Meanwhile, Bear has let slip that Charlotte is “good at kissing” as rumours continue to swirl about the nature of their relationship. They're certainly close (Photo: Instagram) 
The pair sparked rumours of a romance when they began filming Just Tattoo Of Us, thanks to cosy social media posts including one showing them wearing His and Hers jumpers. 
While they’ve stayed coy about what exactly is going on, Bear has dropped his heaviest hint yet that it may not be an entirely platonic relationship. 
"Charlotte, honestly, it's nice 'cause she's fit. It helps, if she was ugly, I wouldn't really enjoy my time here,” he told MTV News . 
"And she's good at kissing… I've said too much!" Bear planted a kiss on Charlotte in the teaser clip (Photo: MTV) The show challenges people to let their loved ones design a tattoo (Photo: MTV) They've kept coy on dating rumours (Photo: MTV) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Bear Snapchats video of him pinching Charlotte Crosby's bum Share this video Watch Next 
Celebrity Big Brother winner Bear and former Geordie Shore star Charlotte co-host the new programme, which sees people getting tattooed by friends and family without knowing what the inking will look like. 
"There was lots of crazy moments in the show. One of the craziest things would probably be me physically attacking Bear after seeing what he did to us,” Charlotte told MTV. 
She declined to reveal just what Bear did, though, meaning we’ll have to tune in when the show kicks off on Monday, April 3 at 10pm to find out. They filmed the MTV show last year His and Hers jumpers suggested at romance (Photo: Instagram) Read More Charlotte Crosby shares cosy snap with Stephen Bear as they continue to hint at romance 
The pair are currently on holiday together abroad; they jetted off together despite rumours circulating that Charlotte had ditched Bear because of his antics on E4’s Celebs Go Dating. 
Bear is signed up for the second series of the show, which sees celebrities trying to find love with regular members of the public. 
He hinted to Heat magazine earlier this month his role on Celebs Go Dating was a barrier to a relationship with Charlotte happening. 
“She’s funny, she’s witty, she’s clever, she’s independent - she’s got all the right attributes. It’s just the wrong time, because I’m filming the show,” he said. Bear focused his Snapchat camera on Charlotte's rear on Sunday night (Photo: Snapchat) He scribbled on her face at the bar (Photo: Snapchat) Playing games! (Photo: Snapchat) Bear certainly looks happy with Charlotte (Photo: Snapchat) 
But fans are still wondering after they jetted off on hols together, and appear to be staying at the same luxury hotel. 
Ever the tease, Bear has been posting numerous Snapchats from the vacation showing him with Charlotte, although he's either taken them from behind so you can't see her face or he's used a filter to scribble over it. 
Oh, Bear! 
Charlotte, meanwhile, appeared to hint people didn't know the full story when she cryptically tweeted: “I find it funny how many people are assuming/guessing/MAKING UP things about my life. 
“Different story every day. Cray cray.” Like us on Facebook
